title: Broken Kingdom
description: They took something from me, something that I didn’t know I needed until it was too late.They hurt her.They broke her… broke us.Now it’s my turn.The need for revenge burns through my veins.I’ll take everything from them.I’ll hunt them down one by one.I’ll make them pay in unimaginable ways.No one will ever hurt her again, not even me.The only question is, will I find my way back to Aspen before it's too late.***The conclusion of the trilogy.***
author: C. Hallman
